text: Daniele Rugani (; born 29 July 1994) is an Italian professional footballer. He plays as a centre back for Juventus and the Italy national team. He was born in Lucca, Italy. On 11 March 2020, Rugani tested positive for COVID-19, following its outbreak in Italy. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Tuscany Category:People from Lucca
title: Daniele Rugani
